abstract: United States stocks make small gains after turbulent afternoon as price of oil continues to fall and energy and mining stocks tumble.

headline.print_headline: Early Rally Fades, but Indexes End Higher
headline.main: Early Rally Fades, but Indexes End Higher

snippet: Strong results from the investment bank Morgan Stanley lifted financial stocks, but energy and mining stocks continued to slump.
lead_paragraph: Strong results from the investment bank Morgan Stanley lifted financial stocks, but energy and mining stocks continued to slump.
